name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a tandoor for a smoky flavor.

name: Dal Makhani
description: Creamy black lentils simmered with butter and spices, a classic North Indian dish.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Marinated paneer cubes grilled to perfection with bell peppers and onions.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy with butter and spices.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas served with fluffy deep-fried bread, a Punjabi specialty.

name: Samosa
description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, served with chutney.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft milk-solid dumplings soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

name: Naan
description: Soft, leavened flatbread cooked in a tandoor, perfect with curries.

name: Biryani
description: Fragrant rice dish with marinated meat, spices, and herbs, cooked to perfection.

name: Raita
description: Cooling yogurt side dish with cucumbers, mint, and spices.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: Boneless chicken pieces marinated in spices and grilled, a popular starter.

name: Kheer
description: Creamy rice pudding with nuts and cardamom, a traditional Indian dessert.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: Dry curry made with potatoes and cauliflower, seasoned with Indian spices.

name: Papadum
description: Thin, crisp disc-shaped food typically based on lentil flour.

name: Jalebi
description: Sweet, coiled dessert made from deep-fried batter soaked in sugar syrup.
